body.name: Summit Appliance MHOTR243SS 24 inches Wide Over-the-Range Microwave, 1.4. cu.ft. Interior, Stainless Steel Trim, Auto Cook, Multi-Stage Cooking, Removable 12.75 inches Glass Turntable, 10 Power Levels Black
features: 1.4. cu.ft. interior provides ample room for heating & cooking small or large dishes
Top and bottom feature a brushed stainless steel accent for added luxury in the kitchen
Range hood includes two bulbs for convenient illumination of the cooking zone
Choose from 10 power levels to ensure optimum level of heating of food and beverage
Power saving mode that disables display, outside lamp, and fan (Note: this mode turns on automatically after 1 minute of inactivity)
body.description: Summit Appliance MHOTR243SS 24 Wide Over-the-Range Microwave, 1.4. cu.ft. Interior, Stainless Steel Trim, Auto Cook, Multi-Stage Cooking, Removable 12.75 Glass Turntable, 10 Power Levels The MHOTR243SS is a 24 wide over-the-range microwave designed for simple one-touch cooking and effective ventilation. Its jet black door is accented by real stainless steel trim, while a small window affords the opportunity to keep watch of your cooking. A side pocket handle offers a more streamlined look to complement any kitchen style Key Features: 1.4. cu.ft. interior provides ample room for heating & cooking small or large dishes Top and bottom feature a brushed stainless steel accent for added luxury in the kitchen Range hood includes two bulbs for convenient illumination of the cooking zone Choose from 10 power levels to ensure optimum level of heating of food and beverage Power saving mode that disables display, outside lamp, and fan (Note: this mode turns on automatically after 1 minute of inactivity) Microwave light automatically illuminates when the door is opened A mounting plate, exhaust adapter for top or rear-venting, hardware for installation, installation guide, and top/rear cabinet wall templates are included for user convenience Two included to remove grease particles helping to keep the exhaust fan and ducting clean Specifications: Overall Dimensions (HxWxD): 17.5 x 24 x 24.75 Weight: 53 lb Capacity: 1.4 cu.ft Amps: 13.5 Voltage/Frequency: 115 V AC/60 Hz Wattage: 1000 Controls: Digital Digital Display: Yes Turntable: Yes Turntable Diameter: 12.75 (32 cm) Interior Height: 10 (25 cm) Interior Width: 14.5 (37 cm) Interior Depth:14.3 (37 cm)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Wish there was a zero star option. This stopped working after 6 months, and the company was totally unresponsive. I recommend you go outside, scoop up 1.4 cubic feet of dog poop and cram it into the space above your oven range, and you might have better luck heating your food than we did with this piece-of-garbage microwave.
